    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(char playerID)

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayerID

        public char getPlayerID()
        returns an integer corresponding to the teams color when created
        Returns:
        0 for white team and 1 for black team

      • makeMove

        public java.lang.String makeMove(char pID,
                                 boolean isCheckmate)
        reads in user input and checks against commands, then returns input string
        Parameters:
        pID - char used to delineate colors of teams
        isCheckmate - boolean used to determine if the game is over
        Returns:
        String of user input (coordinates for piece moving)

      • inCheck

        public boolean inCheck(int kingRow,
                       int kingCol,
                       Player p)
        checks the location of the players king to show if he is in check from any players on the opposing team
        Parameters:
        kingRow - int for the row value of the kings location
        kingCol - int for the col value of the kings location
        p - Player whose king is in question
        Returns:
        true if king is in check from other team's pieces, false otherwise
